Your promiscuious race gains %.0f%% growth rate on all kinds of planets. Conquered planets pick up this habit as well.
Being single, or having no or few children, is accepted by your culture, resulting in %.0f%% growth rate on all planets. Conquered planets get so depressed they exhibit the same behavior.
Your civilization discovered fractional reserve banking before the wheel, granting you %.0f%% more tax and trade income.
Your monetary minister is the guru G. M., so tax aversion, unemployment and black market thrives in your empire. Your tax and trade income is reduced by %.0f%%.
Your race always loved to have strong defenses. Therefore, space stations, planetary shields and planetary guns gain %.0f%% hitpoints.
Your race never really cared about defense properties of your planets. Therefore, space stations, planetary shields and planetary guns lose %.0f%% hitpoints.
Your race simply loves guns and explosions. All damage dealt by your forces increase by %.0f%%.
Either your race was scientifically incapable or just to pacifistic, the damage dealt by your forces is decreased by %.0f%%.
Your race are better at sciences and can research technology at %.0f%% less cost and time.
Your race gets ideas and scientific processes at a much slower rate, which means %.0f%% more cost and time per research.
Your ancestors always looked at the stars with fascination. And they even managed to find some nearby planets.

Astronomers, perhaps due they get bored with their own planet, have mapped the entire galaxy of habitable planets and are quite ready to send satellites to explore them. You'll find them in your inventory.
Your speech skills impress the most hard-hearted aliens. You gain %.0f%% chance they will agree to your terms.
Diplomacy is not your strong skill. You lose %.0f%% chance they will agree to your terms.
Skilled engineers will repair your fleet without military spaceports, although at a much lower rate. However, your shields will regenerate faster between battles.
Your engineers are brave enough to help you fix and regenerate your shields during battles, so long as the shield generator isn't destroyed.
Spy Centers support a single operative and play the major role in spying against enemy empires.

Cancel colonization.[n]Construction or production related to the earlier colonization attempt won't be stopped,[n]although it won't progress to the next step.[n]Existing or en-route colony ships might be diverted to another colonization tasks.

[c=FFFFCC00]Builds and upgrades civil buildings, such as houses, food factories and hospitals, on demand.[/c][n]If necessary, power plants are built or upgraded as well.[n]This setting might be used to keep planets well supplied.[n]It tries to upgrade buildings first before building new ones to save space.

[c=FFFFCC00]Builds and upgrades economic buildings, such as traders spaceport, bank, etc.[/c][n]If necessary, power plants are built or upgraded as well.[n]Best used to ensure these kinds of buildings are available and upgraded on all planets.

[c=FFFFCC00]Builds and upgrades factory buildings: spaceship-, equipment- and weapons factories.[/c][n]If necessary, power plants are built or upgraded as well.[n]Best used ensure these kinds of buildings are available and upgraded on all planets.

[c=FFFFCC00]Builds morale-boosting buildings, such as church, police, bar, stadium, etc.[/c][n]If necessary, power plants are built or upgraded as well.[n]Best used to ensure these kinds of buildings are available on all planets.

[c=FFFFCC00]Upgrades any upgradable buildings to their maximum (as money permits).[/c][n]If necessary, power plants are built or upgraded as well.[n]Best used to ensure buildings are upgraded on all planets.

[c=FFFFCC00]Performs all kinds of management tasks automatically:[/c][n]- builds or upgrades buildings based on population demands,[n] including special demands such as Stadium or Fire Brigade,[n]- builds and/or upgrades power plants, replaces them with more efficient ones if they become available,[n]- builds factories and economic buildings, then upgrades them to maximum,[n]- Builds morale-boosting buildings such as Church and Bar,[n]- Builds a Military Spaceport,[n]- Builds Radar, Shields, Barracks and planetary guns and[n] replaces them if a newer version becomes available.[n]- Produces and/or deploys tanks, fighters, starbases up to the maximum capacity, replaces them if newer versions become available[n]- Adjusts the tax level to keep the population happy enough but tries to maximize the tax income[n][n][c=FFFFCC00]Notes and warnings:[/c][n]- Tanks and rocket sleds are deployed in 2/3 + 1/3 mix, plus one per special units.[n]- Places production orders which might disrupt the main production the user intended.[n]- Builds an Orbital Factory if there aren't any in the empire.[n]- If multiple planets have this mode, they are handled in order of their problems or demands.
